Text: A question: At the end of disc 6 they tell you the program will continue on disc 7.... but this torrent only has 6 discs? Is there more discs?

No, there are only 6 discs.  Here is what is on the Barnes & Noble web site:

(Compact Disc - Unabridged, 6 CDs, 416 minutes)
How do you play these files???

Go to http://www.speex.org.  From there you can download what you need for whatever OS you are using.

Speex is incredible.  Here it shrunk 6 full CDs down to 132 MB, with near perfect fidelity.
This can't be the whole book, hence the comment about at least 7 discs.....and also the story about him actually outsourcing his dating-life is missing... :/
i downloaded this from my local library and it was in 9 wma parts. It is about 116 megs.
I own this book and I can confirm that disk six ends right in the middle of a story.  There is still another 2+ chapters remaining.

I just checked with my local library and they carry it, and it's indeed 7 CDs.  Unfortunately I am #20 in the queue so it may be several weeks or months before I can get disk #7.  When I get it I will create a new torrent for just that disk and add a comment here with the URL for it.
yeah disc 7 would rock. thanks man!
